name: places/ChIJK58luOdYwokRjtKwRB6wvpI
adrFormatAddress: 1101 1st Ave., New York, NY 10065-8737, USA

originalText.text: Nice family run business.  I took a long dress with lining to get hemmed and their price was very reasonable.  I was able to change into my dress in their bathroom for measurements.  I dropped it off on a Wednesday and it was ready for pick up on the following Tuesday.  Highly recommend for anyone in the area.

text.text: Nice family run business.  I took a long dress with lining to get hemmed and their price was very reasonable.  I was able to change into my dress in their bathroom for measurements.  I dropped it off on a Wednesday and it was ready for pick up on the following Tuesday.  Highly recommend for anyone in the area.

originalText.text: Absolutely incredible service above expectation. I had a shirt with pretty bad sweat stains (on the inner collar so not noticeable while wearing) that other dry cleaners never really resolved, but this place sent my shirt back for a second round after the stains didn't come out on first pass and actually got the stains out, and without additional charge. Exceptionally professional, they know what they're doing and they do it well.

originalText.text: Honestly, the best dry cleaning and laundry service ever - better than all others I’ve ever used. Always on time, clean and prompt pickup & delivery, prices are so reasonable, can’t beat it. My dry cleaned clothes look new when they come back from Ming cleaners. Thankful!

text.text: Honestly, the best dry cleaning and laundry service ever - better than all others I’ve ever used. Always on time, clean and prompt pickup & delivery, prices are so reasonable, can’t beat it. My dry cleaned clothes look new when they come back from Ming cleaners. Thankful!

originalText.text: I’ve been using Ming’s for dry cleaning and same-day wash and fold for 2 years. I can’t recommend this business enough. Not only is the price the best in the area, but everyone at Ming’s is friendly and professional. The free pickup and drop off is so convenient, and they treat the clothes with respect (separate washes and folded so nicely—I’ve never had anything shrink).

text.text: I’ve been using Ming’s for dry cleaning and same-day wash and fold for 2 years. I can’t recommend this business enough. Not only is the price the best in the area, but everyone at Ming’s is friendly and professional. The free pickup and drop off is so convenient, and they treat the clothes with respect (separate washes and folded so nicely—I’ve never had anything shrink).

originalText.text:
I have to brag on them for my most recent experience. I was heading out of town and had worked late - meaning they were closed by the time I got home. I gave them a call and explained that I had an early morning flight and desperately needed my clothes to pack. They went above and beyond, and even though they were closed and their delivery person was no longer there, someone came after hours and hand delivered my laundry!

I have been using Ming's for over a year now and am extremely happy with the service I've gotten. The most important thing to me in a laundry service is consistency, quality & timing. They have been very accommodating to my schedule - coordinating and calling to ensure I'm home before coming to pick up or dropoff. My clothes are always completed in a timely manner and folded nicely. I have never had any problems. In fact, they have called a couple of times over the last year to confirm I was sure I wanted them to dry a couple of items.

Several people in my building are now using Ming's as well! Highly recommend!
